website_summaries.verdict: This is a great option for those looking for a smaller razor for those more delicate areas or bikini lines.
pros: Mini blade only 0.625" wide.Easy-grip handle design for control
Shea butter lubrication on each blade
cons: This isn't really a trimmer, just a convenient, small razor

customer_reviews.title: Only 1. 3 pack for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was 1 pack of 3 for $24.99. I thought it was a box since I have ordered a box a ghis price before. This is disgusting.., shame on you
customer_reviews.author: mdiaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Bikini Razors ~ Must Have Items!  See Photos.......
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mini razors! Smooth easy glide shave, thanks to the shae butter lined tops. Each razor has tini comb teeth and comes with a cap. See photos for a better look. These will last longer than disposable razors would and I feel like they were a good value. Will be ordering more. Smile. Hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: MariamG

customer_reviews.title: I thought I had found the perfect raiser for those hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had found the perfect raiser for those hard to reach places...but this is NOT it!! I read all the comments, and most of them were so positive, I was excited to try it. The size of the raiser is perfect! But it has this cover/shield on it and THAT is the problem! It just doesn't shave well at all!! You can shave over the same area like 50 times and still... it doesn't shave like I had hoped. I am very disappointed, and going back to research mode to see if I can find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: truecountrygirl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for "detailing"
customer_reviews.text: This does fit into tight spaces, so this is perfect for shaving the bikini area. However, it is not the sharpest razor so I use mostly my regular size razor and only really use this to get into the regions that the bigger razor doesn't comfortable shave if you know what I mean. I haven't had any of the snagged hairs that other reviewers mentioned while using this product, and no irritation either. It is perfect for detailing. Literally my only complaint is that I wish it were even sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly tiny, I did not realize they were so small before I purchased them. It’s roughly half the size of a regular razor. Due to its size it takes longer to trim and doesn’t leave a consistent trim since I had to use my fingers to hold the hair for the trimmer to actually do what it’s supposed to. Definitely meant more for trimming around edges rather than to trim all the hair down there. Not what I was looking for and they feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Weissenburger

customer_reviews.title: Bikini friendly
customer_reviews.text: Walmart discontinued these and I have been looking for these every where. Thank goodness I can now get them from Amazon. These are so convenient for shaving the bikini area.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little razors, very safe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these little razors. I'm six months pregnant and haven't been able to touch up my lady parts safely so the jungle had sort of reclaimed the land (sorry for the apt description). I felt very safe using these, and even though I had to really reach because of the length of the handle, these worked perfectly. I would definitely recommend these to people and reorder them myself when need be.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize how small these were!!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO small! Like, very tiny.....easy to lose in the shower, slip out of hand.....and last but not least....the blades are very short, meaning I am no longer "trimming' but taking forever for a "smooth" trim...it DOES NOT TRIM!!!! It shaves!!! Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Best little easy to use shaver razors that you may never find.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Noxzema bikini Shavers, aka razors for many, many years. These are the best little razors ever made. And I don’t know why Noxzema ever stopped making these little handy dandy shavers... If you’re lucky enough to find these bikini shavers, let’s hope you’re lucky enough to afford them now. I should’ve stocked up earlier!
customer_reviews.author: jcali

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love these; they are great! They give you a smooth shave and are perfect for sensitive areas! I think that they actually don’t full as fast as other razors either! I wouldn’t buy any other product now! Also, these are great if you’re prone to cutting yourself while shaving, they definitely make it harder to knock yourself than a traditional razor does!
customer_reviews.author: Kalex824

customer_reviews.title: All around great!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get all that much of a "close shape", but it's definitely a smooth shave, no cuts or shave rashes. It's small, so definitely portable. It's an acceptable razor for those lady areas, when you're in a rush to get beach ready.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kim

customer_reviews.title: Used them for years, always worked well for me!
customer_reviews.text: I know this product had some weird reviews but from my experience, these razors have always worked well for me no matter where I bought them. Very cute, convenient little razors. Hair doesn’t get jammed in them so they’re pretty quick to use. They advertise the “trimming” part, but I don’t see how they would be trimmers. They shave everything well. I don’t think I’ve ever been cut by these and I’ve been using them for years. (: their compact little design makes it perfect for a small gal like me to get into the small places. Definitely try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: A battle of performance vs longevity
customer_reviews.text: The reason that I saw see several times is that they're fairly close shaving and they're just the right size to get in the crevices when you're shaving your underarms. The reason they suck is it just throws of all razor lasts about 3 times before you have to get a new one. It's great performance combined with aggravating longevity.
customer_reviews.author: The Organic Millennial

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention to dimensions. These are less than an inch from side to side and maybe 3-4 inches long. A bit interested to try to hold properly when they seem to be made for people with baby hands. I accidentally got much more hair off than I intended to the first time using it. Keep in mind, that I prefer trimmed to shaved, so that may not be bad for what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Eerie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING!!! No you will not get a smooth as a baby’s bum finish like you get with a wax - but for regular maintenance these are so awesome. No more incredibly painful ingrowns, they are an adequate size for shaving your lady (or man) parts.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Best Manual Bikini Razor
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Venus Bikini trimmer because I first received one free with my Venus razor and though it was awesome! So when it got dull I searched for it on Amazon bought another one. While searching, I also saw the Noxzema Bikini Plus Shave and Trim -- so I bought a pack of those (3 pack) too! Well, in comparison, Noxzema Bikini trimmer is so much smaller and easier to maneuver without fear of inflicting some kind of tragic injury! Additionally, you get a 3-pack for about half the price of just one Venus trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go & in the golf cart
customer_reviews.text: I buy these cute little things and give them to my golfing girlfriends. We keep them in our golf bags for those times when we are in the sun and see all those spots we missed in the shower. They are fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Works best dry, works great, will be buying more.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer using it when dry. I've used it both in the shower and out and I think being dry works better. It doesn't get you a clean shave like a razor, but it is pretty close. LIke with razors if you go against the way your hair grows your skin may get irritated, but it works just as well going with the way it grows and your skin will be just fine. It also works just fine if your hair is a bit long.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I may be an idiot, but i don't really see the "trim" idea with these because they literally shave down to the skin. Not really what I was wanting. I wanted something small and did the same thing as my old faithfuls....BIC Soleil Shave & Trim Disposable Razor and Bikini Trimmer. Never again will I ever stray away from something that already works!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Ok trimmer, not a good razor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a razor, but it’s more of a trimmer blade with a guard on the front. I really was not able to get a good smooth shave. I’m sure it will be great for trimming if you haven’t shaved in a long time but I don’t usually. Might be good for a mans mustache.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bikini Razors on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I laughed when I saw how small they were in real life. I thought I had gotten scammed because how could a razor so teeny be expected to shave!! Well, it does and the size of it helps. These razors are amazing and I’m a convert for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god I love this product so much!! First time in my life to shave, but this works even better beyond my imagination!! Will not hurt at all, and shaves *very* well. I would love to stick to this for the rest of my life. Shaving is so easy and quick, and even becomes an enjoyable thing when I use it. (Sounds like I'm crazy but I just cannot fully express my love towards it.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Not the closest shave. But it does allow you to get around tricky areas. However, it doubles the time it takes due to the size and the blade. The blade is weird and something you need to get used to. It feels like it's ripping hair out if you don't hold it at the right angle. Overall, gets the job done if you have time and you're careful.
customer_reviews.author: KikiSpenser

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are insanely handy. I received my first package as a gift and now they are on my subscribe and save. We have a pool so keeping the bikini line nice and clean is a frequent chore. These make it a breeze!!! I've never used anything for this purpose that works so well. This is one of those weird things where when you get it and then you say "wow, these are great" and then buy a bunch for friends. I find I can use one three times and it feels like new. I then toss it for cleanliness reasons and also because I like a really smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use razors
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my wife and the size is just want she wanted for the hard to hit areas, so easy to use too. What a great deal and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: wow, I pass these by every time I see them in store and glad that I took a chance. I cant believe something so small makes such a huge difference. They have a great razor guard and easy to use wet and dry and no razor burn. I am going to keep adding these to my Amazon orders so I always have them.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn in CA

customer_reviews.title: Get The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: These razors are perfect for the bikini area and a must for bathing suit season! They are little but get the job done without the hassle of possibly getting nicked. I love using these more than a razor beacause they can fit in between small spaces. They leave your skin nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tori R

customer_reviews.title: Best little razors!
customer_reviews.text: These razors are the perfect size to clean up your bikini area. They reach areas other razors can't. I absolutely love them and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Risse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bikini shaver
customer_reviews.text: Finally - I can shave "down there" without risk of cutting myself. They have a little razor guard that keeps the blade away from sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: acr

customer_reviews.title: I never knew I could LOVE a razor.
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC for sensitive skin, I used these on my face around my eyebrows as an alternative for plucking, these are not super easy to use for precise application but I will continue using them because they are GREAT for not making me break out or causing ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: SanguineDream

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is small, but I really wanted it for a trim. These will shave like a regular razor down to the bare skin. I didn’t realize that. So it will cool for bikini line but not the rest of the area
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: I love these although I don't use them for what they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these although I don't use them for what they are designed. When I cut my partners hair and the neck has those little stubbly leftover hairs I use these. I also tend to use them after I wax my eyebrows to extend the time between waxings. It's probably not the best idea but due to some disabilities I have, it's the only viable option. These are tiny enough to fit on his neck or my eyebrows and last a while. They did come slightly opened this time which caused me to not give five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Item!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It's my necessity item! Painless. Love design the small length and contour shape. I hate waxing and hate using other types of razors. I travel with this wherever I go. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: These work fine - I don't actually use them for my bikini, but have used them to shape my eyebrows as well as get rid of any strangler hairs on my face in an emergency. Its better to shave random hairs than pluck them and get an ingrown hair.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal O'Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for pain-free hair removal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and get to all the hard to reach spaces when shaving the entire crotch area (Brazilian style). I've used these for years now. I can't find them in stores anymore so I was excited they were found on Amazon. I've done laser hair removal and waxing but for me it just ain't worth the pain! So I just use these to remove unwanted hair each week. It's nearly impossible to cut yourself and, as long as you lotion up afterwards, you can avoid the pesky red bumps. I just use them with Barbasol sensitive skin shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Texmex

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but clearly did not read correctly. I thought I was ordering 3 packages, not one package of 3. What a rip off from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these small razors
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found these online....can't find them in stores anymore. They are great for other areas like eyebrows or any facial area with hair' they are more gentle than a normal razor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great size - able to shave and cut hair flush ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size - able to shave and cut hair flush with skin, as well as trim hair very short... maybe a bit shorter than I normally like, but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: I will never order it again 😒
customer_reviews.text: Soo disappointed extremely over price and they not even adding the moisture compare to went I got them for the first time;traveling was fast of course since look at the price I paid sheerness also poor.never again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little shaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! This teeny tiny razor is unbelievable! Perfect for the bikini area. No pulling or cutting. Super close shave and easy to maneuver in the hard to reach areas :)
customer_reviews.author: Soccermom18

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS SOOOO TINY!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS SOOOO TINY....THE OTHER BRAND (BLUE RAZOR) IS NORMAL SIZED, GET IT INSTEAD!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Gambrill

customer_reviews.title: I'm sad these are being discontinued. =(
customer_reviews.text: I loved these and they cut hair so well, but not much else to say since they are harder and harder to find now. Others just don't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa C.

customer_reviews.title: To tiny
customer_reviews.text: How are these tiny things supposed to trim anything “down there”? I mean really? I expected something a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeLuva1972

customer_reviews.title: I love these razors and hate that I've not been able ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these razors and hate that I've not been able to find them in any of my local stores for quite a while. I was so excited when I found these on Amazon is such a great price and was able to do a subscription to get the mail to me as often as I needed them so I would never run out again. If you're looking for a small razor that's compact but works really well on small areas, I have a recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven’s Ray

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite comes in small packages
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for bikini lines and eyebrows if needed in a pinch :-) I looked forever to find them again!! This time I ordered 3 packs 😂
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: Best razors for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Love these razors, wish they were sold in the stores! They once were and then stopped. I will alwaya buy these razors!
customer_reviews.author: nsmith

customer_reviews.title: Finally a razor where it is almost impossible to cut ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a razor where it is almost impossible to cut yourself! I found it to be cheaper buying it here than in drugstores/Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: k-stater4_ever

customer_reviews.title: Great for trimming
customer_reviews.text: These little shavers are great for small areas and precise trimming. Had a hare time finding them in stores and was excited to find them here at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Moore

customer_reviews.title: These don't leave the horrible razor burn
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find these in the store. I used to purchase them every spring/summer from a large retailer, but no stores close to me carry them anymore. These don't leave the horrible razor burn, nor do I break out from using it due to having sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Every woman’s best friend!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!!! I use them for my underarms too. It’s literally impossible to cut or hurt yourself. No bumps. And the hair is cut so short you can’t even see it. The only thing I hate is the blade gets so dull so fast but I just try to buy a bunch and stock up when I see them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bikini area
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the bikini area never Gad an accident they are Great
customer_reviews.author: TANIA SCHMALL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and super price
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to be able to find these because I had looked several places With no luck ; wonderful shavers No razor burns ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good shave but not so great at trimming
customer_reviews.text: I really like Venus Bikini Disposables and was hoping this is a more affordable way to get the same trim. When I used these, the little combs did help me from getting nicked but did not give me a trim; it shaved me clean like a baby's bottom. I prefer a trim so that i don't get poked by all the stubs when it starts growing back. If you are looking for a shave, not a trim, this is a good way for you to go.
customer_reviews.author: Darlaina Dancer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy they are on Amazon because I can't find them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my "can't live without" items. I'm so happy they are on Amazon because I can't find them in stores anywhere! They are great for touching up certain areas, if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: KB91

customer_reviews.title: Nick free shaving
customer_reviews.text: The comb helps prevent razor burn. It doesn't give a perfectly smooth shave, of course, but that is part of the design. Good for areas where a naked shave isn't the objective and nicks and razor burn are a problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I though and still shaves too close as if your using a razor without a guard. Which gives me a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Marquez

customer_reviews.title: really like these
customer_reviews.text: I really like using these and they are hard to find in the store.
customer_reviews.author: bella-bug

customer_reviews.title: um not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: ok so this is a bikini shaver but i used it for my legs and it really doesnt do a good job at all. it takes like 20 strokes for one small area on my knees. i dont recommend unless you want a sloppy uneven and overall bad shave
customer_reviews.author: customer457

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting at all! The bikini ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting at all! The bikini razors that I've used in the past had a comb guard which allowed the razor to act as a trimmer. That is not the case with these - the comb guard is microscopic, which means you might as well use a regular razor.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Great bikini trimmers. Can’t find these in stores year round, so this is the best place to buy them. They seem safer and more manageable than the electric versions.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Can't find these in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I used to regularly purchase at Wal-Mart, until a dreaded trip when they magically stop carrying one of my favorite products. I've been to 3 Wal-Marts, CVS, Walgreens & 2 local pharmacies and no one in my region carries these any longer. They last a couple weeks, but rust very easy even when dried & stored blade-up. There aren't any other products like this that I've found, so I remain loyal to Noxzema.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: These are little life savers and they are inexpensive and for some reason, hard to find. I love these for little areas needing a quick touching up. They are small, have a protective cap and are simple to use. Can't live without them. Can be used pretty much on any area not just the bikini area.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: This product delivers easy, speedy
customer_reviews.text: Where have these been all my life?? If you are considering this item than I don't need to share the challenges that come with use of such items. This product delivers easy, speedy, and nick free smooth skin. Bam! Please and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy on the Coast

customer_reviews.title: Just in case....
customer_reviews.text: These are great for travel or to keep in your purse for "emergencies".... Good for face and body. I don't recommend using it on multiple spots at the same time, just keep the body and face razors separate.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Petru TudosaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best bikini shaver ever!! Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing - gets very close! I use it for bikini, to shave my husband's neck in between cuts, and for my underarms in that tricky little spot. My local store stopped carrying them, so I've been getting them here. You will NOT be disappointed. So good!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sharp blades, precise shaving
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp razors that are narrow enough to maneuver easily. They don't cause nics or bumps. Doesn't require shaving cream for a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to see them on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy these at Wal-Mart but they stopped selling them. I was so happy to see them on Amazon. I've gotten my friends hooked on them too. The angle is just perfect. No razor bumps, nice clean shave.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I can't figure out how to use these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to trim my bikini line. I can't seem to figure out how to use properly. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things are the best for cleaning up down below for males. Don't have to worry about cuts.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Awkward to use.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I bought a bunch because they were on sale and now I have to throw them all out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanfilippo

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a long time looking for these after our local Walmart stopped selling them. They're easy to handle. Small, but effective enough to get the job done. They're ouch less and does not cause bumps or irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: It was tiny. I thought it was going to be a normal sized razor.
customer_reviews.author: picky buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Goatee
customer_reviews.text: Another guy here. I use these to trim around and right under my lip and soul patch. Because I have a goatee I wanted something to get in the smaller areas inside the circle made by a goatee. These work great and last awhile! It's one blade a guard and a slip area , so it glides a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: They are great for a quick
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these online for several years now , since I cannot find them in the store anymore. They are great for a quick, dry-shave in the bikini area. No irritation at all, and have never cut myself down there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these little shavers
customer_reviews.text: Sexy, I know, but at 52, I need to pay a little more attention to hair removal. I love these little shavers but had a hard time finding them at my supermarket or drugstore. These little shavers stay sharp and ate just the ticket for grooming. I am so happy I am getting them on subscribe and save so I don't have to hunt for them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie ETop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and easy to use! Don’t cut your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than a Razor
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me about these little shavers. She uses them for the bikini area and told me that they work so much better than a regular razor. Boy was she right. They are easy to use and don't cause razor burn. They are small and make the bikini area nice and put together. I highly recommend checking them out. You can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower trim.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! How did I not know about this super easy way for grooming in the shower. I'm not sure about using it for shaving, I'm not exactly sure how that would work, but trimming is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: L Brighten

customer_reviews.title: stores stopped selling them and I love them. RECOMMEND to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking EVERY WHERE for these. stores stopped selling them and I love them. RECOMMEND to everyone. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those delicate areas
customer_reviews.text: I've always used regular razors to shave my bikini area and had to be very careful with the standard wide blade cartidge. The Noxema Bikini Plus is designed perfectly for those hard to get areas with a smaller blade cartridge, I've never felt or looked so smooth! I love it, I have signed up for bi-monthly delivery, a must for every woman. Also works great on my arm pit area.
customer_reviews.author: OE

customer_reviews.title: Saves you time and no bumps
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I love them because your hair doesn’t get caught, and stuck, between blades like regular shavers do. The hair just falls off as you shave. I never get razor burn, or bumps from these either.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great no bumps
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Idk why they stop selling it at my local stores
customer_reviews.author: RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: Only shaved fuzz hair
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Only shaves the fuzz hair off, any corse Hair it goes over and Hair remains
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice size. the blade is a little far from ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice size. the blade is a little far from the comb, but maybe it's supposed to be. I don't think it cuts as well as others that I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Julie stewart-olah

customer_reviews.title: The idea of a comb and a blade in one razor may have sounded like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who bought shave small areas under and around my mustache. It cuts! Cuts hair and meat equally. The idea of a comb and a blade in one razor may have sounded like a good idea, but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those hard to reach spots
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I used to get them at different stores but have not seen them for a long time on shelves. I was thrilled to see them available here.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! They get on the intimate areas they way you need without cutting yourself. Highly recommend for closer shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned these wouldnt give a close shave because ...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned these wouldnt give a close shave because of the vlear plastic thing at the top... But they give a very close and smooth shave. I'm addicted.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: They’re my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found these on line they use to carry them in the stores. It seems they were whipped from the shelves. Easy to use. And safe from cuts and also gets the job done! Wink wink
customer_reviews.author: VeeN

customer_reviews.title: They so a pretty good job
customer_reviews.text: Dont underestimate these tiny little shavers for the lady parts. They so a pretty good job!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Heagney

customer_reviews.title: Pink ones are great but for some reason I was sent the green which are not as good
customer_reviews.text: The pink ones are great, but I received the green ones even though I ordered the pink ones. The green ones are not as good at all for some reason. The pink would get 5 stars from me, the green not so much.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted :)
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find these where I live , I’m so happy to find them !
customer_reviews.author: Andrea June

customer_reviews.title: Best razor for sensitive body parts on men or women
customer_reviews.text: I miss when I could find these at the store. They’re great for men and women. I’ve never nicked myself with these once.
customer_reviews.author: Valusagi

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy these all the time. They were less than $1 pre-tax at my local Walmart. However Walmart stopped carrying them. I was so happy to find them on here. A few dollars more than I was use to but worth every penny. These little babies are amazing. I just love that they can't clog and they really leave me with a nice clean shave. They work 100 times better than you would think for that price. Shipping was pretty fast and timely. Average 4 days to literally come from the West Coast to East Coast. I'm totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Liv81296

customer_reviews.title: keeps me trim
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me trim downtown, very small and easy to use in that area, wont cut yourself at all.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shaver! Perfect size and no fear of cutting or nicking the sensitive areas! :)
customer_reviews.author: amjb0815

customer_reviews.title: Handy little things!
customer_reviews.text: These trimmers work great for tight places. They don't pull and definitely don't knick the skin. I've not been able to find them in the store, so I have purchased them frequently on Amazon through Subscribe & Save.
customer_reviews.author: Chel Mare

customer_reviews.title: Rusted in the shower
customer_reviews.text: These are only ok, nothing special. I was hoping to keep one in the shower for shaving, but even with the cover over the blade it developed rust within the first two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: spangler1176

customer_reviews.title: Worth the try...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but the product itself worked well. I thought they were going to be bigger in size with a smaller head/razor part. Overall these razors were a little small for my use on a regular basis but it was worth the try.
customer_reviews.author: aschneid88

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are not at all what I wanted. Way too short of a trim.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

product_meta.title: Noxzema Bikini Shavers and Trim
product_meta.description: Keeping bikini line hair low, groomed and maintained, Noxzema Bikini Shave & Trim disposable razors are the perfect summertime, vacation setting, beach going, swim suit wearing accessory a woman can own. Coming three per package, the razors have a 5/8 inch wide mini blade intricately designed to target delicate, hard to reach areas of the body that a normal size razor cannot get. With the curves and contours of a woman’s body in mind, the ergonomic, easy grip handle provides confidence and control while shaving, trimming or grooming unwanted hair from sensitive areas. The Shave & Trim razors provide a smooth, effortless shave thanks to the shea butter lined tops. Skin smoothing shea butter gives lubrication and moisture where it’s needed most. The comb design with a protective skin guard and cap minimizes skin irritations and prevent cuts or nicks while shaving. When summertime prepping, use Noxzema Bikini Shave & Trim disposable razors—the premium razor for all sensitive area shaving.
feature_bullets: Painless and convenient, Noxzema Bikini Shave & Trim disposable razors are the best razors to use when shaving delicate areas of the body
The easy grip, easy gliding handle fits comfortably in users’ hands for confidence and control. Designed to fit the curves of a woman’s body, the razors easily get rid of unwanted body hair
The skin smoothing shea butter lined razor top is moisturizing and silky, making the razor incredibly easy to pull lightly and evenly over skin
With a great price point, convenient size and lightweight construction, the razors can be easily kept in a purse, backpack, tub room, bathtub, guest bathroom, flat or hotel for use anytime
Noxzema Shave & Trim razors target visible, sensitive, precise areas and are great for athletes like swimmers, divers, runners, triathletes and volleyball players to maintain a clean bikini zone
